scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Member_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#if ($context.UserId < 0) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($user = false) #set($user = $core_v2_user.Get("%{Id=$context.UserId}")) #if (!$user || $user.HasErrors()) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('user-administration.vm')
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('user-profile.vm')
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('user-settings.vm')
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('user-groups.vm')
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('user-roles.vm')
#set ($headerTemplateId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('headerTemplateId')) #set($userTitle = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Unknown_User')) #if ($user) #set($userTitle = $user.DisplayName) #if ($user.Username != $user.DisplayName) #set($userTitle = "$userTitle ($user.Username)") #end #end #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.userAdministration') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
